feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Ariba Supplier Risk
feed.subtitle: SAP Ariba Supplier Risk Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Ariba SLP Inbound Data
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a query regarding SLP integration with S4/HANA, Let's take the scenario, I have created vendor master data in SLP and with Integration the same vendor master data is created in S4/HANA, If I change some data in a specific vendor or block some of the vendors in S4/HANA will the change reflected in Ariba SLP by changing in S4/HANA?

Thanks in advance

entry.title: Risk Engagement Request Send Modular Questionnaires
entry.content:
Hello,

I have been trying to set-up the Control-Based Engagement Requests, but I am not able to send out the modular questionnaires to suppliers/internal users.
What I did was link a risk control to a certain modular questionnaire and like the documentation said I added a "to do task" to send out this modular questionnaire in the risk engagement template but I was not able to send out this questionnaire.

My question now is: does the modular questionnaire needs to be sent out as a stand-alone questionnaire to this supplier via the SM Modular Questionnaire tab or is it also possible to do it via the engagement request? If it's via the engagement request, how can I do it?

Thanks in advance,

entry.title: how to capture more details in user profile?
entry.content:
How to capture or add additional fields in the User profile screen for a given user, we are expecting to store user related details like what type of user ? user sub type?

Please let us know as to how to do achieve this via user data import ?

We want to capture if a user is contractor or permanent employee in profile.

entry.title: SAP Ariba export Task issue
entry.content: Hi Experts, I am trying to "Export Supplier Organization" report from any third party application I'm not able to retrieve the file but when i am trying to "Export Addresses" report it is working fine. Can anyone help me with the issue?

entry.title: Is Unified Vendor Master and Business Partner the same thing/model?
entry.content: Is Unified Vendor Master and Business Partner the same thing/model?

entry.title: Change assignee in the Risk Assessments section
entry.content:
Hi

In Supplier Risk, I have multiple assessments in one Engagement Request that are being sent to one supplier. I want to send some of these assessments to different contacts as they are the SME for the supplier and would be in a better place to answer. Is it possible to send assessments to different contacts or can my primary contact forward the assessments on to the relevant contacts within his organisation?

Thanks for your help!

entry.title: How can you create a report that shows all Risk Controls Status?
entry.content:
I want to create a report that shows the status (i.e. effectiveness rating) of all my Risk Controls for all Engagement Requests?

I couldn't see it in the pre-packaged report and couldn't build it? The status field is showing whether it's been completed but not the rating effectiveness.

Thanks!

entry.title: How to learn SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle Performance, what is the material needed?
entry.content:
Hello Members,

I am interested and keen to learn SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance module from a consultant perspective. Can anyone help me with the learning path, key points, topics to cover, configuration checklist with steps, any link etc. 

So, it would help me understand complete SLP Process from a consultant perspective. 

(P.S: Please help me with any inputs possible, your help is appreciated. I'm looking for free Material/ Sources)

Thank you in advance.

Warm Regards,

Manisha

entry.title: communicated to the supplier
entry.content:
We require that when the supplier logs into SAP DSN Ariba a pop-up window is displayed with information customized by the buying company.

Please provide indications if you have managed such requirements through SAP DSN Ariba.

Thanks

Percy Rozas

entry.title: Disable notifications in Supplier Risk
entry.content:
My team and end users keep getting lots of notifications from Supplier Risk when a a project is created, issue created, project assigned to them or added to a project etc.

How can I disable these notifications please? I've tried in Project Manager > Project Email Templates but I can't see the relevant notifications nor can I delete them from there.

Many thanks,

Lian

entry.title: Inquiry Regarding Access to SAP Ariba System for Training and Application
entry.content:
Dear SAP Ariba Community,

I am currently in the process of learning SAP Ariba and am eager to gain practical experience by training on the system and applying the knowledge I have acquired.

Could you kindly guide me on how to obtain access to the SAP Ariba system for training purposes? I am interested in exploring the functionalities and features of the system to enhance my skills and contribute effectively in a real-world business environment.

Your assistance and insights on this matter would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your time and support.

entry.title: SAP Ariba Supplier Management 2H 2023_Stay Current
entry.content:
I took the SAP Ariba Supplier Management 2H 2023_Stay Current web assessment and the 6 practical exercises.

However, the certification status continues to say that it is only valid until 2024-06-03?!

Can you understand why the status was not updated?

entry.title: integration: Workzone/Cloud Identity Services/Azure AD/Ariba
entry.content:
Hi there.
I have a problem. I need to integrate Cloud Identity Services with Ariba and Azure AD so that after authentication I can access the workzone.
Using the authentication conditional, I can authenticate through the user's domain to which Azure Ad belongs. However, with Ariba, I cannot do a conditional as it does not have its own domain, so the solution was to load the IAS with Ariba user data by introducing a group and by identifying this group (which is the same one that will be set in the conditional) you will be able to identify that the user is from Ariba and validate it in Ariba.
However, the load made in IAS may not be the same load that is in Ariba, in which case there may not be a match.

To solve this problem, I would have to insert a landpage in which one button would be for Azure AD (internal users) and another button for Ariba (external users), and by clicking on them I could do the SSO correctly.

However, I am unable to find an example of how to do this, because according to the documentation provided by sap, I have not yet managed to achieve a positive test.

Here is the documentation:
https://help.sap.com/docs/identity-authentication/identity-authentication/use-allow-identity-authentication-users-log-on-option

I would need some guidance, or some suggestion so that I can solve this problem without having to burden the IAS.

I thought that leaving Ariba as the default in Cloud Identity Services, I would use an external service that can validate me in Azure AD and redirect me to the Portal, without the need to use the IDP in Cloud Identity Services. But also, I couldn't find an example or anything like that.

Any suggestion, idea, or experience (if by chance, you have gone through the same scenario) is very welcome.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Ariba Supplier Registration status did not change to pending resubmit
entry.content:
Hello,  we have a supplier that was previously registered and approved.  They made changes to their registration.  We responded needing additional information and updates to the registration. 

The log shows details:  Supplier registration project registration update status changed from Pending Approval to Pending Resubmit.

When we look at the supplier registration there is an information message at the top:  The registration questionnaire is pending resubmission from the supplier.   However, the Registration Status still shows as Registered.  We were expecting this to change to Pending Resubmit.

Is this a correct status/behavior since the supplier was previously registered and approved?  Should the status have changed?  If so, where might I look for any missing logic of configuration settings?

Thank you,  Cheryl

entry.title: Ariba Risk - Extending Supplier Screens with 3rd Party API Data
entry.content:
Hi, 

I am looking into creating a scorecard screen within supplier risk in Ariba and whether it is possible using the Arba APIs

Is anyone able to point me to

- the direction needed in terms of skills i.e. front end and middleware BTP, CPI
- any systems pre requisites 
- how long a piece of work like this might take? 
- If there might be any other ways to import external scoring data to ariba risk for a supplier

entry.title: Hi, can someone please share a sample test script for Supplier Risk, if possible ?
entry.content:
We are implementing Supplier Risk for our customer and are closing the build. In parallel want to start writing the test script for supplier risk for user testing.

It would be helpful if you can share incase you have some scripts available which can be repurposed

 

Thanks

entry.title: Issue with ARI-16207: Calculate Inherent Risk for Engagement Requests by Risk Domain
entry.content:
Hi,

In the recent release of Ariba Supplier Risk, there was new feature added 

ARI-16207: Calculate Inherent Risk for Engagement Requests by Risk Domain

After it was enabled and tested on client portal, it doesn’t appear to allow domain-based scores to trigger assessment questionnaires.  (Eg. assessments can be only triggered by answers to questions or the overall inherent risk score, not domain-based scores).  It is bad user experience where we perform a scoring by domain but then need to enforce some business rule to say “do you need to trigger a Privacy questionnaire” and if yes, trigger the questionnaire.  A better solution would make all domains scored as Medium or above to trigger a questionnaire automatically.  Is there any workaround related to this?
 
"Triggering DD questionnaires cannot be done by domain (eg. needs either an overall IR score, or specific question(s) to trigger)"

entry.title: Issue with ARI-16207: Calculate Inherent Risk for Engagement Requests by Risk Domain.
entry.content:
In the recent release of Ariba Supplier Risk, there was new feature added 

ARI-16207: Calculate Inherent Risk for Engagement Requests by Risk Domain

After it was enabled and tested on client portal, it doesn’t appear to allow domain-based scores to trigger assessment questionnaires.  (Eg. assessments can be only triggered by answers to questions or the overall inherent risk score, not domain-based scores).  It is bad user experience where we perform a scoring by domain but then need to enforce some business rule to say “do you need to trigger a Privacy questionnaire” and if yes, trigger the questionnaire.  A better solution would make all domains scored as Medium or above to trigger a questionnaire automatically.  Is there any workaround related to this?

 

"Triggering DD questionnaires cannot be done by domain (eg. needs either an overall IR score, or specific question(s) to trigger)"

entry.title: Supplier login issues
entry.content: Supplier wants to register for our company without creating new username but using existing account. He receives error saying account is not linked. How to troubleshoot all the scenarios while registering in Ariba.

entry.title: Change existing ANID to New ANID after registration of supplier
entry.content:
I have registered a supplier, but they were registered with different ANID, but now they requested to change the ANID to the one on which they manage global business with other customers. 

Can someone please help me to achieve this with the steps?
